text: Iubilaeum Anno Dracula 2001 is the first EP by the Italian band Theatres des Vampires. The name of the album, as well as the logo in the cover art is a parody on the Great Jubilee of 2000 ("Iubilaeum Anno Domini 2000"). == Track listing == ==Line-up == *Lord Vampyr − vocals, acoustic guitar *Necros − keyboards, samples, backing vocals * Incubus − lead guitar * Mortifer − rhythm guitar *Blutsauger − bass *Blasfemator − drums, backing vocals *Scarlet − backing vocals * Justine − backing vocals Category:Theatres des Vampires albums
title: Iubilaeum Anno Dracula 2001
